text:
@fred_guttenberg Trump, Ron DeSantis, Betsy DeVos and many Republicans are willing to sacrifice thousands of American lives for nothing more than political points. They will do anything, including taking all of us on a Death March, to maintain power. 

https://t.co/5VUZiTSl31
